articles.description: The NFL's wildcard weekend continues across the AFC and NFC - follow live text and radio commentary from three games.
articles.title: NFL playoffs LIVE: Denver Broncos at Buffalo Bills, Green Bay Packers at Philadelphia Eagles, Washington Commanders at Tampa Bay Buccaneers - live text, radio commentary and score updates

articles.description: Arsenal's season is in the balance, as their FA Cup exit highlights manager Mikel Arteta's failure to sign a striker.
articles.title: Arsenal & Mikel Arteta pay price for failing to address striker flaw

articles.description: Altay Bayindir was the subject of ridicule after his last Manchester United performance. Now manager Ruben Amorim saluted the goalkeeper as "our hero" as he inspired them into the FA Cup fourth round.
articles.title: Altay Bayindir: Turkish goalkeeper becomes Manchester United 'hero' in FA Cup win at Arsenal

articles.description: Barcelona come from behind to beat Real Madrid in an incident-packed Spanish Super Cup final in Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: Real Madrid 2-5 Barcelona: Hansi Flick's side win 15th Spanish Cup

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka opens her Australian Open title defence with a straight-set victory over American Sloane Stephens.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Aryna Sabalenka begins title defence with victory over Sloane Stephens

articles.description: Championship side Plymouth Argyle are drawn at home to eight-time winners Liverpool in the FA Cup fourth round.
articles.title: FA Cup fourth-round draw: Championship Plymouth to play eight-time winners Liverpool

articles.description: A net malfunction, a defender pulling off a bit of 'Maradona' skill he could not explain and the keeper who became a dad just the day before, the tales of Tamworth's dream FA Cup tie at home to Tottenham.
articles.title: Tamworth 0-3 Tottenham: Non-league side tick almost all the FA Cup magic boxes

articles.description: The Buffalo Bills dominate the Denver Broncos in a 31-7 Wildcard Weekend win that sets up a mouthwatering Josh Allen v Lamar Jackson clash in the next round.
articles.title: NFL play-off results: Josh Allen to face Lamar Jackson after Bills beat Broncos in wildcard round

articles.description: Napoli move four points clear at the top of Serie A after a comfortable 2-0 win at home to Hellas Verona.
articles.title: Napoli 2-0 Hellas Verona: Leaders Napoli open up four-point gap

articles.description: Newcastle come from behind to beat League Two Bromley in the FA Cup and make it eight consecutive victories in all competitions.
articles.title: Newcastle 3-1 Bromley: Premier League side come from behind to win FA Cup tie
